name: Nana's Declassified School Survival Guide
description:
experimental game about the woes of high school!! i made it mostly to familiarize myself with this engine and to release my inner highschool angst. its really bad, just like the real thing!! (only niner kids remember these jokes)(aka only 2 ppl will laugh)

there are 2 endings that are very minor in how they differ

at least i know how to use rm2k3 now tho

TUMBLR LINK: http://kalinascope.tumblr.com/post/90973681933
